content: this chic crochet balaclava is perfect for adding flair to your outfit designed using red heart super saver stripes you ll love that the colorwork is taken care of for you worked in row and in the round it s a great pattern for practicing half_double_crochet no matter the color you choose this runway-inspired balaclava is sure to turn heads and because it s made with super saver you can enjoy a vibrant look season after season yarn for model red heart® super saver stripes™ 5 oz/141 g 236 yds/215 m - retro stripe 4971 1 ball
